scripts.dev: echo '🚀 Starting development server...' && yarn && react-scripts start
scripts.start: echo '▶️ Starting production server...' && react-scripts start
scripts.test:watch: echo '👀 Running tests in watch mode...' && react-scripts test --watch
scripts.eject: echo '⏏️ Ejecting from create-react-app...' && react-scripts eject
scripts.serve: echo '🌐 Serving build folder on port 3000...' && http-server build -p 3000
scripts.docker-up: echo '🐳 Starting Docker containers...' && docker compose up
scripts.docker-system-prune: echo '🧹 Running Docker system prune...' && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker-image-prune: echo '🧹 Running Docker image prune...' && docker image prune -f
scripts.format: echo '🎨 Formatting code with Prettier...' && prettier --write .
